name: Two-Story Wooden Cabin
description: A secluded two-story wooden cabin located on Crescent Street B, used as a former safe house by a hacker. The location is tied to multiple secret cyber pursuits and later becomes indirectly linked to a suspicious death scene nearby.

snapshot.name: Two-Story Wooden Cabin
snapshot.description: The cabin appears unremarkable from the outside, blending in with the quiet residential surroundings. Internally, it once functioned as a hacker's safe house, chosen specifically to avoid surveillance systems. Evidence suggests hurried data destruction and prior illegal digital activities connected to underground networks.

clues.clueText: Traces indicating the cabin was deliberately chosen to avoid surveillance systems, making it an ideal safe house.
reveals: The occupant was highly aware of and actively avoiding digital monitoring.

clues.clueText: Evidence that a computer once used here had been completely destroyed and removed.
clues.location: Former workstation area inside the cabin
reveals: A hacker attempted to erase all traces of their activities.
Someone later recovered or tampered with the destroyed device.

clues.clueText: Network activity traced to this cabin abruptly ceased here.
reveals: This was the endpoint of a cyber pursuit involving multiple hackers.

conditions.description: Dim interior lighting, with no modern security systems or active electronics.

events: The hacker known as Lucifero traced a rival hacker's signal to this cabin.
A destroyed computer was recovered and partially restored elsewhere.
The cabin later became contextually linked to Bruno's death nearby.

exits.description: The main entrance facing the street.

snapshot.keeperNotes: This location is primarily a background investigative site. It provides context rather than direct confrontation. Emphasize its role as a deliberate blind spot in the town's surveillance network and its importance in the cyber conflict between NPCs.
permanentChanges: The cabin is no longer actively used as a safe house.
Its role as a former hacker hideout can be discovered permanently.

connections.description: Bruno's body is found in his car parked in front of this cabin, linking the location to his death.
Information recovered from this cabin indirectly leads to events at the Reindeer Bar.
